snippet: While a public declaration of being interested in negotiating peace is a breakthrough of sorts, any real progress remains a long shot.
abstract: Editorial welcomes Taliban's declared interest in negotiated peace agreement in Afghanistan, but questions whether group is ready to forsake insurrection for politics.
lead_paragraph: While a public declaration of being interested in negotiating peace is a breakthrough of sorts, any real progress remains a long shot.
